data.comment: Carlo Pinsoglio (Juventus) is shown a red card without being on the pitch!
The match is underway at Allianz Stadium.
Juventus's Cristiano Ronaldo misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 1, It's a goal kick for the away team in Turin.
Goal kick for Torino at Allianz Stadium.
Corner awarded to Juventus.
In the minute 4, Free kick for Torino in their own half.
Torino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Juventus close to the penalty box.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Torino at Allianz Stadium.
Daniele Orsato signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
Torino have been awarded a corner by Daniele Orsato.
In the minute 9, Goal! Nicolas N`Koulou gives Torino a 0-1 lead in Turin.
Important block from the Torino defence as Federico Chiesa fires in a strike for Juventus.
Juventus have been awarded a corner by Daniele Orsato.
In the minute 12, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Tomas Rincon for Torino who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Torino's Simone Zaza is on target but unsuccessful.
Tomas Rincon has recovered and rejoins the match in Turin.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Juventus in the half of Torino.
Daniele Orsato awards Torino a goal kick.
Ball safe as Torino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 16, Daniele Orsato signals a free kick to Juventus.
In Turin, Juventus push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 24, Federico Chiesa for the home team is judged to be offside.
Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Turin a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 27, Torino have a goal kick.
Free kick for Torino in the half of Juventus.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 30, Torino needs to be cautious. Juventus have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick Torino.
In Turin Torino attack through Lyanco. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 32, It's a goal kick for the home team in Turin.
Free kick Juventus.
Juventus's Paulo Dybala gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Torino defender.
In the minute 34, Corner awarded to Juventus.
Corner awarded to Juventus.
Daniele Orsato awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 36, Can Torino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Juventus's half?
Goal kick for Juventus at Allianz Stadium.
Daniele Orsato signals a free kick to Juventus just outside Torino's area.
In the minute 41, Torino have a goal kick.
Paulo Dybala for Juventus drives towards goal at Allianz Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Juventus have been awarded a corner by Daniele Orsato.
In the minute 45, Torino's Andrea Belotti gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Daniele Orsato awards Juventus a goal kick.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Turin.
In the minute 45, Juventus to take a throw-in in Torino territory.
Daniele Orsato blows to end the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Juventus in their own half.
Throw-in Torino.
Daniele Orsato waits before resuming play because Federico Chiesa for Juventus is still down.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Torino in their own half.
Federico Chiesa is back on his feet again.
Juventus have been awarded a corner by Daniele Orsato.
In the minute 51, Can Torino capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Dejan Kulusevski (Juventus) gets a yellow card.
Ricardo Rodriguez (Torino) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 53, Daniele Orsato signals a free kick to Torino.
Throw-in Torino.
Dejan Kulusevski is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 56, Dejan Kulusevski for Juventus is back on the field again.
Juventus push forward at Allianz Stadium and Cristiano Ronaldo gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Torino defence.
In the minute 57, Corner awarded to Juventus.
Aaron Ramsey (Juventus) has replaced the possibly injured Dejan Kulusevski.
Juventus drive forward but Leonardo Bonucci is judged offside.
Ball goes out of play for a Torino goal kick.
In the minute 63, Daniele Orsato signals a Juventus throw-in in Torino's half.
Daniele Orsato signals a throw-in for Juventus, close to Torino's area.
Federico Chiesa of Juventus gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 64, Torino have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Juventus have been awarded a corner by Daniele Orsato.
In the minute 67, Daniele Orsato signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
Torino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Torino to take a throw-in in Juventus territory.
In the minute 70, Ball goes out of play for a Torino goal kick.
Lyanco for Torino has been booked by Daniele Orsato and receives a first yellow card.
Daniele Orsato signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
In the minute 71, Alex Sandro is replacing Danilo for Juventus at Allianz Stadium.
Juventus make their third substitution with Weston McKennie replacing Adrien Rabiot.
Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 72, Matthijs De Ligt is booked for the home team.
Free kick for Torino in their own half.
In the minute 75, Throw-in for Torino in the half of Juventus.
Marco Giampaolo is making the team's first substitution at Allianz Stadium with Sasa Lukic replacing Simone Zaza.
Juventus awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Allianz Stadium, Sasa Lukic has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Throw-in for Torino at Allianz Stadium.
In the minute 77, Juventus's Federico Chiesa gets in a shot on goal at Allianz Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Juventus.
In the minute 77, Weston McKennie (Juventus) levels the match at 1-1 with a header.
That's a fine assist from Juan Cuadrado.
Daniele Orsato signals a Torino throw-in in Juventus's half.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Juventus in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Torino in Turin.
Can Torino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Juventus's half?
In the minute 81, Juventus have been awarded a corner by Daniele Orsato.
Juventus are coming forward and Juan Cuadrado gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Turin.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Juventus in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Juventus in the half of Torino.
In the minute 82, Daniele Orsato signals a Juventus throw-in in Torino's half.
Corner awarded to Juventus.
Daniele Orsato awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 85, Free kick for Torino in the half of Juventus.
Corner awarded to Juventus.
In Turin a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 89, In Turin, Paulo Dybala of Juventus is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Juventus have been awarded a corner by Daniele Orsato.
Goal! Juventus have taken a 2-1 lead courtesy of a header from Leonardo Bonucci.
In the minute 89, Juan Cuadrado instrumental with a fine assist.
Ball safe as Juventus is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The fourth official's board shows 6 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball safe as Juventus is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Daniele Orsato signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
Throw-in for Torino at Allianz Stadium.
In Turin, Jacopo Segre (Torino) misses the target with a header.
Goal kick for Juventus at Allianz Stadium.
Daniele Orsato signals a free kick to Juventus.
Throw-in Torino.
7 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Daniele Orsato signals a free kick to Juventus in their own half.
Daniele Orsato awards the away team a throw-in.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
The away team have replaced Karol Linetty with Jacopo Segre. This is the second substitution made today by Marco Giampaolo.
The home team replace Paulo Dybala with Federico Bernardeschi.
Marco Giampaolo (Torino) is making a third substitution, with Federico Bonazzoli replacing Cristian Ansaldi.
Juventus's Juan Cuadrado has been booked in Turin.
Federico Bonazzoli (Torino) has received a first yellow card.
